title: what beats a TF backdooring your nexus to win the game in terms of irritation
body:
seriously

a TF that can backdoor your nexus at any time is super stressful and makes you feel as if though you can never leave sight of your nexus, ever, until inhibitors come up, even then TF can backdoor those

it irritates me a lot and players i've played with can't stand that situation

is there anything that beats this though? be honest with me
